name: df-mgmhm
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cmgmhm, cmpo(s0, s1, cmgm, cmgm, crab(s2, co(cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), cmap, cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wral(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s4))), co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cplusg, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4)))))))))
comment: A magma homomorphism is a function on the base sets which preserves the binary operation. (Contributed by AV, 24-Feb-2020.)
